name: Tatsugiri
flavorText: This is a small dragon Pokémon. It lives inside the mouth of Dondozo to protect itself from enemies on the outside.

previous.name: Dondozo
previous.flavorText: This Pokémon is a glutton, but it’s bad at getting food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.

next.name: Annihilape
next.flavorText: When its anger rose beyond a critical point, this Pokémon gained power that is unfettered by the limits of its physical body.
